data.message: Eminem I am trying to help you, but because you are so famous you need to come to me, I cannot come to you. So in order for me to be able to help you, you will need to help me first. Please listen to me, do not ignore what I have to say, I am here by God to guide you! This isn't a joke or something fake, this is real and very serious! If anyone who reads this can contact Eminem for me please do so, because I can only go this far within my power. If you truely care about Eminem then help me get a hold of him, please! This is a truely important message sent by the Lord!!! I am the Archangel Uriel. 💙

replies.message: You could feed your dogs for $.50 a day with Purina dog chow. Save that $8 a day for rent and security deposit. I'll bet rent in ND is pretty cheap. Your dogs will be fine, quit spoiling them.

How about you don't know anything about my situation or my Animals and shouldn't tell others what to do. I don't have rent, I am a bum on the streets with no shelter at all. I sleep on the cold ground in two sleeping bags with all my winter clothes on. I have physical ailments which make it so I shouldn't be working a job at all, but good luck getting SSI in this country now days. And I do not spoil my Animals, I do what I have to to keep them healthy. Try doing some research on your famous "kibble" crap food, maybe you will decide to "spoil" your pets after you see the truth!
